works.complaint:
Dear Google, I am quite concerned that you have not  
addressed my Blogger query which has been submitted to you several times  
this week and last week.  I am hence using this form rather than the  
blogger complaint form so that I can speed up this matter.  The blog  
author, a one Mr Basheer Fremaux Soormally, has published a significant  
personal email of mine that I sent to him via Yahoo mail, effectively  
making it accessible publicly.  My email to him was a request for him to  
remove content from another external blog where my name is cited.  However,  
Mr Soormally has now added the request to his own blog, stating that he  
will not make any changes until I explain my objections [I HAVE!! - HE WILL  
NOT ACCEPT IT - I AM CONCERNED THAT MR SOORMALLY WILL SIMPLY PUBLISH MORE  
MATERIAL IF I CONTACT HIM AGAIN].  This information is injurious to me in  
that persons desirous to google my name for business reasons (I run a full  
time school in the UK) are now directed towards my "dispute" with him as  
opposed to my business activity (education).  Mr Soormally refuses to  
communicate or respond to my calls and emails.  I simply require the email  
he has published to be removed and all references to my name removed from  
his blog - I desire no censorship of his words however.
